sentence: Fifteen Republican legislators have signed on to Fillmore's bill, including Rep. Mark Finchem, the Trump-endorsed candidate for Arizona secretary of state.

title: An Arizona Republican just unveiled the most brazen election bill yet

sentence: Four days later, Lake and Mark Finchem appeared with Trump and spoke to thousands of his supporters in Florence, Arizona.
title: Now every day in Arizona is January 6

sentence: The bill already has 15 Republican co-sponsors, including state Rep. Mark Finchem, the Trump-endorsed secretary of state candidate seeking to take over the state's elections.
title: Arizona bills embrace Trump conspiracy theories — could allow GOP to reject election results
